item.description:
***Donate $25.00 to this Event by 9 AM Friday, June 3 and you get a Free Ticket to the Natives Happy Hour with Wally on June 10. Please contact the Event Host, Maryellen***

Please Donate or Walk with me! Support a Red Sox Native and Win Red Sox tickets at the 2nd Annual Walk for Teen Light on Saturday, June 5th from 9:30 am - 1:00 pm. This is a 5k Walk that begins and ends at Burlington Town Common with games, snacks, live music and a raffle that includes Red Sox tickets.

"Teen Leaders Inspired to Give Hope to Teens" is a group of 300 Burlington 8th graders raising money to end child abuse. Their goal is to raise $20,000. We need walkers and donations.

It is $20 for adults to walk, $10 for kids. It is completely amazing to see what good teenagers are capable of doing. If you are unable to walk, donations in any amount will be more than welcome.

To make a donation though Amazon payments, please visit my blog at http://maryellenm15.b...

or E Mail me at
maryellenm15@aol.com
item.name: Donate or Walk,Win Red Sox Tickets at 2nd Annual Walk for Teen Light Burlington
